Line1.6DE47: You assume we’re treasure hunters, don’t you?
Line3.BAE4: I’m not assuming anything. I just want some answers.
Line5.6DE47: Look, ever since I can remember, my mother took me around looking for Horadric artifacts. It was an obsession.
Line7.6DE47: And when she learned of this vault and wanted to find it… I couldn’t say no.
MenuLabel: “Why were you and your mother looking for this place?”
